L

log - Variable in class main.controllers.LoginController
 
log - Variable in class main.controllers.LogoutController
 
log - Variable in class main.filters.LoggingInterceptor
 
log - Variable in class main.MyConfig
 
logged - Variable in class main.beans.LoginSessionBean
 
LoggingInterceptor - Class in main.filters
Filter: LoggingInterceptor Description: Will block any redirect but login if the session bean user flag (logged) is not on.
LoggingInterceptor(LoginSessionBean) - Constructor for class main.filters.LoggingInterceptor
Constructor: c'tor to initialize and keep the SessionBean
LoginBean - Class in main.beans.loginHandlerPack
Bean: LoginBean Description: This bean is to keep the login data from the 'login' view.
LoginBean() - Constructor for class main.beans.loginHandlerPack.LoginBean
Constructor: empty c'tor Description: needed empty c'tor
LoginBean(String, String) - Constructor for class main.beans.loginHandlerPack.LoginBean
Constructor: overload with arguments filed c'tor.
LoginConstraint - Annotation Type in main.beans.loginHandlerPack
Constraint: Custom validation Description: Custom Annotation to validate login filed.
LoginController - Class in main.controllers
Controller: LoginController Description: This controller managing the login with LoginBean Object and its Custom validator.
LoginController() - Constructor for class main.controllers.LoginController
 
LoginSessionBean - Class in main.beans
Bean: LoginSessionBean Description: This bean is to manage the session. it configure to create by session and it hold a boolean that flag if that session is logged in or with up to date session, or its not.
LoginSessionBean() - Constructor for class main.beans.LoginSessionBean
Constructor: c'tor for configuration Description: init the flag and created as instance in MyConfig
loginSessionBeanv() - Method in class main.Application
Function: loginSessionBeanv Description: we declare a bean to be created by Spring in each user session
LoginValidator - Class in main.beans.loginHandlerPack
Validator Class: Custom login validation Description: This class implements from ConstraintValidator with the Custom annotation 'LoginConstraint' that contain 'filed()' method to declare if we validate the username or the password. it returns in "isValid" overload method the answer.
LoginValidator() - Constructor for class main.beans.loginHandlerPack.LoginValidator
 
LogoutController - Class in main.controllers
Controller: LogoutController Description: Handling logout requests Members: log - injected LoginSessionBean to change the logged flag
LogoutController() - Constructor for class main.controllers.LogoutController
